title: I'm just tryin to GP adc.... Come on... lemme in your team :)
body: Everybody denying my old school pistoliering

replies.body: Who needs an ADC? All you need is Mundo building full tank items with a support Soraka.
Now I have to try this :)

It's been 15 minutes now, come on.....   I'll use the sultan skin so not only am i shooting stuff with a highly outdated pistol, I'll also be doing it with a turban on my head.

How can you lose? 

:D
